    Caliber

Our services

Our core services are web and mobile development. We build and maintain websites and applications using industry best practices, and will work with you one-on-one to bring your ideas to life.

Web Development

A strong web presence is a necessity for every modern business today. We design and create beautiful websites using industry-standard frameworks and cutting-edge open source technologies.

iOS

Using Objective-C or Swift, our iOS applications are built with usability and scalability in mind.

Android

We design and develop Android applications with flexibilty and user experience in mind. Your application will look and perform well on every device.

Maintenence/Enhancement

Looking to add new features or redesign an existing website or application? We can improve your application's look and feel while also enhancing the underlying functionality.

Content Management Systems (CMS)

Implement a popular Content Management System into your existing website to simplify the creation and posting of all types of media.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Gain a competitive advantage in search results using SEO. We will develop a viable SEO strategy to increase your site's traffic and search engine rank.

Our team

We're a team of hardworking developers and designers from the Kansas City area with backgrounds in web, iOS and Android development. Our team has software engineering experience with a wide range of companies, from startups like Knoda and TuneIn to established companies like Garmin and Cerner.
